name: Workout Simulator
description:
Train your fingers to spam as fast as possible!

In Workout Simulator, you must prevent a heart from moving to the left side of the screen. Pressing the space bar will move the heart back to the right of the screen. The heart will move faster the longer you play the game.

The key is to pace yourself. Start out slow with the heart and as the heart moves faster, you can click faster too!

Workout to the default "workout" music or mute the music to listen to your own music! Music credits are within the zip file.

Made for the "So Bad it's Good" jam 2020
